titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 117) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2013, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6365) to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to replace the sequester established by the Budget Control Act of 2011.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-667, by Mr. Woodall.

The rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 117 and H.R. 6365, under a closed rule for both measures. Each are debatable for one hour. In both cases all points of order against provisions in the measure are waived, and in each case, one motion to recommit, with or without instructions is made in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 160.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 778.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 178 (Roll no. 572).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 182 (Roll no. 573).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/12/2012--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 117) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2013, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6365) to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to replace the sequester established by the Budget Control Act of 2011.
